description: Mushroom Grove Room - A Tier 1 T-shaped food production room producing 8 Food/min with 3 upgrade paths (Bountiful Harvest, Expanded Growth, Tranquil Garden) and adjacency bonuses with Water and Dark rooms.

userStories.title: Implement Mushroom Grove T-shaped placement and production
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Mushroom Grove to use T-shaped placement validation and produce food based on upgrades and adjacency.
acceptanceCriteria: T-shaped footprint validated during room placement (reuses tetromino placement logic)
Base production of 8 Food/min modified by upgrade multipliers
Adjacency detection for Water rooms (+40%) and Dark rooms (+15%) applied as production bonuses
Upgrade paths modify room stats: Bountiful Harvest increases food output, Expanded Growth increases inhabitant capacity, Tranquil Garden sets fear to 0
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: No room-specific code needed - existing generic systems handle T-shape placement, production, adjacency, and upgrades.
